title: Chocolatey package for Windows
description: Could we simplify the installation process for Windows users by providing a Chocolatey package?

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Hi, you got no initial reply on this issue. Normally we leave to downstream providers to create platform-specific packages such as this. Do you have the skills needed to create one? I would love to have one available, which installs a service as well (such as SOLR-7644). Ideas?

comments.author: Manimaran Chandrasekaran
comments.content:
Hi Andrew

This package with 6.3.0 is moderation now and soon it should be available

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content:
I am going to close this issue as resolved, since 6.3.0 is now available.
Is there a chance to add some of the Apache Solr committers as maintainers of the package so we could also contribute with simple version updates and general improvements?

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: For the record, I am now added as a maintainer of the package, drop me a note if any other committers would like to be added as well.
